name: Pixel Cowboys (Desktop version)
description:
I'm a brazilian solo game developer. Founder of Old Mohave Games Studio. I will be improving this project and adding new stuff in order to release it soon for Android and iOS. Hope you enjoy it. And, please, give me feedbacks!

DEVLOG: 05/01/2018.

Version 0.3

- Player vs Player mode has been finally added to the game!! I really hope you enjoy it.

- Many bugs and code inconsistencies have been fixed too. The game's even more polished.

- For now, I will be focusing on adding some new stuff my other game: Bitcoin Survival. But I will try to split my time and add a new difficulty mode to Pixel Cowboys: an Extra Hard mode in which the player will face only bosses in very fast and challenging duels.

Please, share the game!

Game instruction: When the FIRE sign shows up, tap the screen to SHOOT!

Twitter: @oldmohave
